doc:
Lillian Blauvelt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lillian_Blauvelt 0 Lillian Blauvelt (1873–1947) was a popular opera singer in New York City and internationally in the first decade of the 20th century. Her voice was a lyric soprano with a very pure timbre and dramatic distinction. Her vocal range was from G to D. She was from Brooklyn, New York, and eventually toured every country in Europe. Lillian_Blauvelt ( 1873 – 1947 ) was a_popular_opera_singer in New_York_City and internationally in the_first_decade of the_20th_century .
